MariaDB.description:
MariaDB, relational database management system.

Based on a custom OCI image, available for amd64 and arm64 architecture.

/config.description: Share where the database should be stored.
/config.label: Data Storage [e.g. mariadb-server1]

MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD.description: Enter a root password for the MariaDB server.
MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD.label: Root password [min 4 alphanumerics]

PGID.description: GID to use along with the above UID. It (or the above UID) must have full permissions to the share mapped in the previous step.
PGID.label: GID to run MariaDB as.

PUID.description: UID to run MariaDB as. It must have full permissions to the share mapped in the previous step.
PUID.label: UID to run MariaDB as.
